info.author: Jussi Leinonen
info.description:
A Python code for computing the scattering properties
of single- and dual-layered spheres with an easy-to-use object oriented
interface.

Based on code by C. Mätzler; ported and published with permission.

Requires NumPy and SciPy.
info.name: pymiecoated
info.summary: Single- and dual-layered Mie scattering computations
info.html_description:
A Python code for computing the scattering properties of single- and dual-layered spheres with an easy-to-use object oriented interface.

Based on code by C. Mätzler; ported and published with permission.

Requires NumPy and SciPy.
